Hi guys

Just got Kerbal on xbone. I'm figuring out the basics, but can get the part action menu to work.

I hover over a party (such as fuel tank, parachute) but hitting B doesn't open the menu.

Any solutions? Seems like a lot of functionality is lost if I can't do this!

 

Thanks!

ES

Ok, I found the issue you talk about in the other thread.  Does it happen on XB1 only or is it reproducible on PS4 as well?

Also, what controller preset are you using?

In the Cursor preset the PAW opens with B on XB1 and with Circle on PS4

In the Radial preset the PAW opens with X on XB1 and with Square on PS4

In the Simplified preset the PAW opens with B on XB1 and with Circle on PS4

So I just purchased the game a few days ago.

 

I've tried both sandbox and career modes; I can't access the paw in either mode, nor on any controller preset.

 

I've tried in the VAB and during flight; it makes no difference.

 

Have also tried the usual clear cache, reinstall, new game etc.

 

P.s it also appears several other functions don't work either. For instance I don't seem to be able to use "fine rotation" during assembly, nor toggle SAS via buttons (have to go into cursor mode and click the icon).

It's like I can only access basic commands.

Have tested the controller via an Xbox app. All buttons function normally, so the issue doesn't seem to be hardware.

Edited June 22, 2018 by Ephraim Stone

For anyone else having this problem I found a work around in another post:

In game, turn your current controller off which will pop up the usual dialogue box about controller disconnected etc.

Then turn on a second controller and log back into the game with this. For me, the second controller can now activate everything such as the PAW.

Furthermore, I can then switch back to the first controller, and it too will fully "work" (helpful if you have chatpad, cans attached etc).
